Subject: Re: Happy Birthday Neo Beast wars RPG!
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"

From: Yanshosh@...

I can't really do speaches as well as JP, but happy aniversery, NBW! We 
really couldn't have done as well as we did without dedicated members and 
alot of effort. At one point, it was just JP, Inferno, and me who posted 
regularly, but things have picked up considerably since then. After going 
nearly 300 emails a day for most of the summer, the RPG's certanly prooved 
itself. Let's keep RPGing in the same spirit (although 300 emails a day would 
overload those of us who are back in school)!
